TopicTitle: Convert Random Letters to a Sentence!

Articles.Content:
Many kings juggle, by gosh yes!

**qglgqop**

(generated in python)

queen glogly liked gloopy oranges peeled.

haybiap.

He always yells "boring" in apprehensive posture.

Jeb immediately lands on mighty Minmus.

lsgdfsx

Large smelly goblins dig for some xylitol.

slkjdf

Small lanky kinkajous jump directly forward.

xvzyuqj

xylophones very zero year under queen... jorge? XD

quack

Quite utterly a cool Kerbal.

RYSJFA.

Querying user actions can kill.

I know only one possible sentence out of this:

bbbbbbb

P.S. Ninja'd

RYSJFA - Risk your safety, Jeb, fly awesomely.
